name: Ex Rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department Appeal of: John Singleton

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, and MCCAFFERY, JJ.
parties: Ex Rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department Appeal of: John Singleton.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lester Roy Zipris, Esq., Ellen T. Green-lee, Esq., Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for John Singleton.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Priya M. Tra-vassos, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
Ex Rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department Appeal of: John Singleton.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 15, 2008.
Decided April 18, 2008.
Lester Roy Zipris, Esq., Ellen T. Green-lee, Esq., Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for John Singleton.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Priya M. Tra-vassos, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, and MCCAFFERY, JJ.
